{ "partialurl": "request", "feedbackpolicy": 756150000, "excludefromsearch": false, "hiddenfromsitemap": false, "enablerating": false, "isroot": false, "isofflinecached": false, "publishingstateid": "8fc43945-179a-4c6a-9916-3eea95ad3989", "pagetemplateid": "bf97a374-e510-ef11-9f89-000d3a84f7ba", "parentpageid": "ed7bbc89-ef06-404a-9e11-dab8d697054b", "sharedpageconfiguration": true, "rootwebpageid": "1c1cac77-e310-ef11-9f89-000d3a84f7ba", "copy": "

Request for Foreign or Money services business (FMSB/MSB) registration

\r\n

FINTRAC is modernizing its tools and processes to serve you better. This form is intended for businesses operating as MSB and FMSB.

\r\n

Privacy disclaimer

\r\n

The information that you provide is protected under the provisions of the Privacy Act and will be used by FINTRAC to prepare a reply and in its administration of the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act, as described in Personal Information Bank: Compliance of Reporting Entities – PPU 028. For more information, consult FINTRAC’s Info Source.

", "entityform": "cfffee33-5711-ef11-9f89-000d3a84f7ba" }
powerpagecomponent.name: Case - Create
powerpagecomponent.searchcontent:
Request for Foreign or Money services business (FMSB/MSB) registration

FINTRAC is modernizing its tools and processes to serve you better. This form is intended for businesses operating as MSB and FMSB.

Privacy disclaimer

The information that you provide is protected under the provisions of the Privacy Act and will be used by FINTRAC to prepare a reply and in its administration of the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act, as described in Personal Information Bank: Compliance of Reporting Entities – PPU 028. For more information, consult FINTRAC’s Info Source.

Case - Create
